attributes.action: All illegal immigrants should be fingerprinted and DNA swabbed on arrival.
attributes.additional_details: Because of the sex crimes on women and young girls
attributes.background: Compulsory test all illegal migrants with a DNA swab and fingerprints and add to  a database held at the home  office and cross referenced when crimes are committed in the areas they residing in

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Illegal immigrants entering this country to have DNA taken 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/720453
